nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: getOwnerDao

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwnerDao

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwnerDao

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwnerDao The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnershipDao

@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwnerDao The address to transfer ownership to.
